bug.author: lamberta
bug.description:
The tf-nightly-2.0-preview package does not exist anymore. Please upgrade all notebooks to use %tensorflow_version 2.x like: <denchmark-code>try: # %tensorflow_version only exists in Colab. %tensorflow_version 2.x except Exception: pass </denchmark-code>
Affects:
/site/zh-cn/lite/convert/python_api.md /site/zh-cn/tutorials/estimator/boosted_trees.ipynb

comments.comment:
These files should be synced using out GitLocalize project: <denchmark-link:https://gitlocalize.com/tensorflow/docs-l10n>https://gitlocalize.com/tensorflow/docs-l10n</denchmark-link>
https://gitlocalize.com/repo/4592/zh-cn/site/en-snapshot/lite/convert/python_api.md boosted_tree.ipynb looks fixed.
But this issue is old and I'm working on a better status/notification system. Closing
